thread.title: Benjamin Grant

author: Benjamin Grant
title: Benjamin Grant
text:
The overall experience was fine. No issues with financing, numbers, etc...One piece that was left out was the origination fee, which I understand after the fact. However, when we were discussing numbers, this wasn't mentioned. Only at the point of clicking "yes, fund me" did it show a line item for this.
My only other issue was my Funding date was a Tuesday, and the first payment was Thursday the same week. 2 days doesn't seem like an adequate amount of time for a 'weekly' billing to take place. So, from the money I borrowed, more than $3k was taken before I could set any plans in motion. But it's okay, Like I said the process was easy and I asked to borrow more than I needed. If you're going this route, factor these costs into your expected loan amount.
